text: Hagi Jeremaiaga amanage hunka ome zamasamio. Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzana Israeli vahe Anumzamo'a huno, ama ana waini tina neta neginagi nehuta, amuranetita traka huta umase emase nehuta ete mago'enena oraotiho. Na'ankure Nagra ha' vahera huzmanta'nena e'za, hara eme huramante'za tamazeri haviza hugahaze.
